an8.73:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava natike viharati ginjakavasathe.
an8.73:1.6: “maranassati, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana.
an8.73:2.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.73:2.3: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhavesi maranassatin”ti?
an8.73:2.5: ‘aho vataham rattindivam jiveyyam, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an8.73:2.6: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhavemi maranassatin”ti.
an8.73:3.3: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhavesi maranassatin”ti?
an8.73:3.5: ‘aho vataham divasam jiveyyam, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an8.73:3.6: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhavemi maranassatin”ti.
an8.73:4.3: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhavesi maranassatin”ti?
an8.73:4.5: ‘aho vataham upaddhadivasam jiveyyam, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an8.73:4.6: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhavemi maranassatin”ti.
an8.73:5.3: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhavesi maranassatin”ti?
an8.73:5.5: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram ekapindapatam bhunjami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an8.73:5.6: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhavemi maranassatin”ti.
an8.73:6.3: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhavesi maranassatin”ti?
an8.73:6.5: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram upaddhapindapatam bhunjami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an8.73:6.6: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhavemi maranassatin”ti.
an8.73:7.3: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhavesi maranassatin”ti?
an8.73:7.5: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram cattaro panca alope sankhaditva ajjhoharami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an8.73:7.6: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhavemi maranassatin”ti.
an8.73:8.3: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhavesi maranassatin”ti?
an8.73:8.5: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram ekam alopam sankhaditva ajjhoharami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an8.73:8.6: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhavemi maranassatin”ti.
an8.73:9.3: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhavesi maranassatin”ti?
an8.73:9.5: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram assasitva va passasami, passasitva va assasami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an8.73:9.6: Evam kho aham, bhante, bhavemi maranassatin”ti.
an8.73:10.1: Evam vutte, bhagava te bhikkhu etadavoca:
an8.73:10.3: ‘aho vataham rattindivam jiveyyam, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an8.73:10.4: Yo cayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam maranassatim bhaveti:
an8.73:10.5: ‘aho vataham divasam jiveyyam, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti;
an8.73:10.6: yo cayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam maranassatim bhaveti:
an8.73:10.7: ‘aho vataham upaddhadivasam jiveyyam, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an8.73:10.8: Yo cayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam maranassatim bhaveti:
an8.73:10.9: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram ekapindapatam bhunjami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti;
an8.73:10.10: yo cayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam maranassatim bhaveti:
an8.73:10.11: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram upaddhapindapatam bhunjami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an8.73:10.12: Yo cayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam maranassatim bhaveti:
an8.73:10.13: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram cattaro panca alope sankhaditva ajjhoharami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti—
an8.73:10.14: ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu pamatta viharanti, dandham maranassatim bhaventi asavanam khayaya’.
an8.73:11.1: Yo ca khvayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam maranassatim bhaveti:
an8.73:11.2: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram ekam alopam sankhaditva ajjhoharami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti.
an8.73:11.3: Yo cayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam maranassatim bhaveti:
an8.73:11.4: ‘aho vataham tadantaram jiveyyam yadantaram assasitva va passasami, passasitva va assasami, bhagavato sasanam manasi kareyyam, bahu vata me katam assa’ti—
an8.73:11.5: ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu appamatta viharanti, tikkham maranassatim bhaventi asavanam khayaya’.
an8.73:12.2: ‘appamatta viharissama, tikkham maranassatim bhavayissama asavanam khayaya’ti.
